thread.title_full: Gift Card Granny reviewed by Henry

author: Henry
title: Henry
text:
this is a very very useful site. i buy discounted gift cards almost all the time, before i make a purchase. i mean... why not $ave?!
but before i found this site, i would have 8 card sites that i would individually check to see what the current discount on a merchant was. that was time-consuming. so much so that sometimes if you were 'only' saving like 5%, it seemed like the effort wasn't worth it. but with gift card granny... you check one site. you see all the rates. and it couldn't be simpler.
i have bought over $4,000 in discounted gift cards last year via GCG. 99% of them were fine. there were issues with a few, but the sites GCG reps are all legit, and once they discovered there was any discrepancy with a card, the site always provided a credit within 1-3 days.
GCG is a very very fast way to see the range of discounts, and to then buy the card that fits your purchase best. huge time saver. and often... huge money saver! ; - )
